Subject: Offline Installation
Description:
Hi Team,
This is an enquiry that we have lots of Linux machines in our company. So, some pcs don't have internet access, but they are connected with our company network and system port are not block. we need to have a solution for this issue. There for If you have offline installation for Linux client it will be very helpful for our company.
Solution_Comment__c: Customer confirmed that we may proceed to close the ticket. A new ticket will be created when they conduct the installation test.
